dt: {bc}a liturgical prayer addressed to Christ as Savior
{bc}an image of a lamb often with a halo and a banner and cross used as a symbol of Christ

et: Middle English, borrowed from Late Latin {it}Agnus Deī{/it} "lamb of God," translation of Greek {it}Amnòs toû Theoû{/it}; from its opening words
shortdef: a liturgical prayer addressed to Christ as Savior
an image of a lamb often with a halo and a banner and cross used as a symbol of Christ
